name: Panic Spell
description:
Made for the 8x8 Game Jam 2!

Try and conjure a magic barrier around your home while a living asteroid descends on your home, hurtling rocks at you!

This game is played using only the mouse! Have fun and enjoy!

Tools Used: Godot, Aseprite, Audacity

Credits:

Music: Launchablesocks (@launchablesocks) - "Dark Pulsing Beat Loop"

            Johannes Brahms - "Hungarian Dance No. 5"

SFX: Beep Yeah! (@beepyeahgames)

Font: Ruler Gold by somepx (@somepx)

Screenshake code by KidsCanCode (@kidscancode)

Special Thanks:
Emmy!
